001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j.browser;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.InstanceConfiguration;
005import com.exoreaction.xorcery.server.api.ServiceResourceObject;
006import com.exoreaction.xorcery.server.api.ServiceResourceObjects;
007import com.exoreaction.xorcery.util.Resources;
008import jakarta.inject.Inject;
009import jakarta.inject.Provider;
010import org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.DefaultServlet;
011import org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletContextHandler;
012import org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletHolder;
013import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.RunLevel;
014import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
015
016import java.net.URI;
017import java.net.URISyntaxException;
018import java.net.URL;
019
020@Service(name = "neo4jbrowser")
021@RunLevel(6)
022public class Neo4jBrowser {
023
024    @Inject
025    public Neo4jBrowser(ServiceResourceObjects serviceResourceObjects,
026                        Configuration configuration,
027                        Provider<ServletContextHandler> ctxProvider) throws URISyntaxException {
028
029        // Install servlet for Neo4j Browser
030        URL webRootLocation = Resources.getResource("browser/index.html").orElseThrow();
031        URI webRootUri = URI.create(webRootLocation.toURI().toASCIIString().replaceFirst("/index.html", "/"));
032        DefaultServlet defaultServlet = new DefaultServlet();
033        ServletHolder servletHolder = new ServletHolder("neo4jbrowser", defaultServlet);
034        ServletContextHandler servletContextHandler = ctxProvider.get();
035        servletContextHandler.setInitParameter(DefaultServlet.CONTEXT_INIT + "resourceBase", webRootUri.toASCIIString());
036        servletContextHandler.setInitParameter(DefaultServlet.CONTEXT_INIT + "pathInfoOnly", Boolean.TRUE.toString());
037        servletContextHandler.addServlet(servletHolder, "/api/neo4j/browser/*");
038
039        serviceResourceObjects.add(new ServiceResourceObject.Builder(new InstanceConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("instance")), "neo4jbrowser")
040                .api("browser", "api/neo4j/browser/")
041                .build());
042    }
043}
